name: dating-app-fullstack
description: 婚恋交友网站全栈应用

scripts.build: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run build-client
